rewards.description: Once Human RaidZone Qaixx EXCLUSIVE Wish Scholar Drops event has started and will last until 12:00 AM October 1, 2025 (PDT).  Connect your Once Human character and Twitch account to receive the reward. Watch a Qaixx's RaidZone stream to join the activity! You need to watch for 1 hour to claim Qaixx's EXCLUSIVE Wish Scholar weapon sticker. The reward will be sent to your account in 24 hours.

rewards.description: Once Human RaidZone Blooprint EXCLUSIVE Wish Ace Drops event has started and will last until 12:00 AM October 10, 2025 (PDT). rewards.description: ABIs Full Release is now live! To celebrate the launch of S3 on Steam and Epic, we've prepared a New Round Exclusive Streamers Support Eventthis time, were releasing 4 new streamer stickers, and in response to popular demand, were bringing back 5 streamer stickers from the NS1 Season. Viewers will be rewarded for gifting subscriptions to these eligible streamers in the Arena Breakout: Infinite (ABI) category: ImOw, GL40LabsRaT, HITBOXKING, Arven93, LVNDMARK, QuattroAce, Kritikal, BakedJake, Ralisco. Support your favorite eligible streamers and receive the exclusive Stickers! Note that Viewers who claimed any of these streamer stickers during NS1 cannot re-claim the same stickers this time, and subscriptions will only count toward the event task if gifted while the streamer is live and broadcasting ABI content.
rewards.name: Partner Sticker Sub-Drops

rewards.description: ABIs Full Release is now live! To celebrate the launch of S3 on Steam and Epic, watch Arena Breakout: Infinite content with enabled Twitch Drops to unlock up to 2 skins! Watch for 2 hours: claim the new season Exclusive Skin Reward - Plaster M24 Bolt-Action Rifle! Watch for 4 hours: claim the FRS Event Exclusive Reloaded Skin - DZ Style AKM Assault Rifle! Please link your Level Infinite Pass account and Twitch account on the event page (https://www.arenabreakoutinfinite.com/twitchdrops ), and claim your Drops rewards in time.
rewards.name: S3 Steam Launch Drops
